		allow = {
			 has_country_flag = impossible
		}

			maximum_speed = 1
			sea_defence = 1
			air_defence = 0.50
			positioning = +0.02
			fuel_consumption = 00.03
			sea_attack = 1
			convoy_attack = 1.5
			distance = 0.01
		}

		PBB_Deutschland = {
			maximum_speed = 1
			sea_defence = 1
			air_defence = 0.50

			build_cost_ic = 0.030
			build_cost_manpower = 0.050
			build_time = 4.000
			range = 270
			distance = 0.050
			visibility = -0.250
			fuel_consumption = -0.009
			supply_consumption = 0.010
			maximum_speed = 1.600
			positioning = 0.050
			sea_defence = 1.400
			air_defence = 0.100
			convoy_attack = 0.480
			sea_attack = 0.150
			sub_attack = 0.010
		}

		ger_xxx_uboat = {
			default_organisation = 1
			default_morale = 0.020
